title: Project Planning and Management
description: Define project scope, objectives, timeline, and resource allocation. Set up project management tools and communication channels.

title: Requirements Gathering and Analysis
description: Conduct stakeholder interviews, analyze existing systems, and document functional and non-functional requirements for the deception technology.

title: Database Design for AIDeception Technology
description:
This RFC proposes the design of a database schema for storing and managing decoy data, attacker behavior, logs, and other relevant information. The database design should consider edge cases such as high concurrency, varying data sizes, potential data anomalies, and scalability. Data models will include decoy configurations, attacker profiles, attack patterns, analytics, encryption, access control mechanisms for sensitive data, data retention policies, backup strategies, disaster recovery plans, and compliance with relevant data privacy and security regulations such as GDPR, HIPAA, CCPA.

**Data Models:**
- Decoy configurations
- Attacker profiles
- Attack patterns
- Analytics

**Security Considerations:**
- Encryption for sensitive data
- Access control mechanisms

**Data Management:**
- Data retention policies
- Backup strategies
- Disaster recovery plans

**Compliance:**
- Relevant data privacy and security regulations (GDPR, HIPAA, CCPA)

**Documentation:**
- Document each data model and design decision made
- Include a plan for performance testing and benchmarking the database design due to the sensitive nature of this task, it is recommended to assign both a Database Specialist and a Security Specialist. Since this task involves complex data handling, the Project Manager's input will be crucial in the task decomposition process. For documentation purposes, the Technical Writer should also be involved.

To improve readability, please consider breaking down the description into smaller, more manageable sections and using bullet points where appropriate.

title: Frontend Development
description: Develop the user interface for managing and monitoring the deception technology, including dashboards and reporting tools.

title: Backend Development
description: Implement the core functionality of the deception technology, including AI models, decoy management, and attacker behavior analysis.

title: Security and Penetration Testing
description: Perform security audits, vulnerability assessments, and penetration testing to ensure the robustness and resilience of the deception technology.

title: Integration and System Testing
description: Integrate the frontend, backend, and database components. Perform end-to-end system testing to validate functionality and performance.

title: Deployment and Monitoring
description: Deploy the deception technology to production environments. Set up monitoring and logging systems for performance tracking and incident response.

title: Documentation and Training
description: Develop comprehensive documentation, including user guides, technical manuals, and training materials for administrators and analysts.
